NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM
VESSEL IN VICINITY OF 12-10.00N 041-42.00W
AT 140838Z AUG. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC FORT DE FRANCE. PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, EMAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
